content: square hats are so much fun with floppy pompoms in the corners perfect for a festive two pompom santa hat these are an easy knit great for someone just starting out in-the-round because there is no increasing or decreasing sizes for the everyone imagine the family photos xxs newborn 0-6 months 14″ 36 cm xs baby 6-12 months 16″ 41 cm small toddler 18″ 46 5 cm medium kids small/medium 20″ 51 5 cm large kids large adult small/medium 22″ 56 5 cm xl adult large/xl 24″ 61 5cm using cascade 220 worsted weight wool in ruby and natural needles and tools us8 5 0 mm 16″ circular needle stitch marker darning needle pompom maker i use clover medium for the smallest size and large for all other sizes
